name: Car Parking Simulator
description:
Car Parking Simulator is a fully interactive, realistic and immersive car parking experience. The game has one of the best vehicle physics simulations in VR. Interact and experience the realistic and dynamic behavior of car handling and parking to its fullest. 

Explore the escalating levels of challenges across different terrains and captivating environments that are engaging and fun to drive on.

Features :

- 5 vehicles choices, ranging from SUV, Sedan, Hatchback, Truck etc.
- 5 exhilarating environments in day and night cycles.
- Total 45 levels, giving you ratings based on your skills and challenge completion.
- Realistic and interactive car interiors.
- Many more vehicles (including Formula One Car on the first DLC), environments -and levels to come.

- All cars have Right and Left Steering option

Controls :

- Utilize full power of 6 DOF Oculus Quest while driving the car. 

- Change gears using hands

- Take full control of steering with your hands

How To Install

Please Install from SideQuest :  https://sidequestvr.com/#/ap

Alternatively, you can download the APK from this page and Check this guide if you need help on how to do it!

Future Updates :

- New exciting levels with moving traffic

- Cruise Mode : Get your playlist ready and get on a long ride

- Two Wheeler vehicles
